msg: catch IOException rather than all Exceptions in testBadParams(). Add another "bad document number" test without a field value. Remove unnecessary cast.

author: bmesser
msg: avoid ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException in method refill() when bufferLength gets a negativ value. It happens when TermVectorsReader.get(int docID) is used with a docID larger than number of documents stored in the index.
